Web3 is racing to build the agentic economy: marketplaces, protocols, autonomous agents.

But without verifiable identity, Agent-to-Agent (A2A) coordination falls apart.

Thereâ€™s no A2A economy without trust!

This framework introduce the four layers of AI identity:

Â Architectural â€“ what an AI agent is (model, weights, and code)
Â Behavioral â€“ how it acts (responses & logic)
Â Legal â€“ whoâ€™s accountable for it (the creator or user)
Â Social â€“ who trusts it (attestations &

This hybrid identity model blends privacy with verifiability.

Not full onchain. Not full Self-Sovereign.

Agents prove what matters, privately, selectively, credibly:

â€¢ DIDs (Decentralized Identifier): A self-owned, verifiable identity standard
â€¢ ZKPs (Zero-Knowledge Proof):

This unlocks something powerful - humans can now link their reputation to the AI agents they launch. This includes the:

 Devs who build them
 Experts who train them
 Auditors who verify them

Every claim builds a verifiable trust graph onchain, composable, and ready to be

In the â€œHuman and AI Internetâ€, the first phase of our vision roadmap, Billions will allow humans and AI to be verified privately and securely.
